properties.body:
BAY OF CAMPECHE.
MEXICO.
TEN PERSONS FROM M/V TRINITY II ABANDONED SHIP INTO
LIFERAFT IN 18-50.0N 092-41.4W AT 081739Z SEP.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MEXICAN NAVY,
PHONE: 115 255 5677 7119 OR RCC NEW ORLEANS,
PHONE: 504 617 3048, FAX: 504 589 2148,
E-MAIL: D8COMMANDCENTER@USCG.MIL.
